title: A Neural CNN Game of Life with Keras
description: Why CNNs?the fundamental of this problem deals with surrounding blocks. Kernels in CNNs are better suited for this task as they can sense the changes in surrounding blocks. => less filters with added sense of sequences. Adding a sense of Seqence to the NetworkMaybe combine CNN+LSTM or something new
